values:
** I pretend that I'm glad you went away
But these four walls close in more everyday
And I'm dying inside
And nobody knows it but me

** Like a clown I put on a show
The pain is real even if nobody knows
And I'm crying inside
And nobody knows it but me

** Why didn't I say the things I needed to say
How could I let my angel get away
Now my world is a-tumblin' down
I can say it clearly but you're no where around

** The nights are so lonely the days are so sad
And I just keep thinking about the love that we had
And I'm missing you
And nobody knows it but me

** How blue can I get you could ask my heart
Just like a jigsaw puzzle it's been torn all apart
A million words just couldn't say just how I feel
A million years from now you know I'll be loving you still

** The nights are so lonely the days are so sad
And I just keep thinking about the love that we had
And I'm missing you
And nobody knows it but me

** The nights are so lonely
The days are so sad
I just keep thinking
About the love that we had
Nobody knows it but me

= (

My heart hurts =(... But each day i put on a smile, take it one breath at a time, and put one foot in front of the other...

Its my true friends that really make me want to face the next day... I love yall so much and i dont know what i would do with out you...

Please pray for me... God only knows how i really feel inside...

<3 <3 Chelsea =)

just got back from cheerleading tryouts.... hahahahahaha....omg i sucked soooo bad!! it was so like nerve racking...i was shaking n stuff... lol... definetely did NOT make the team lol...  we find out who made it tonight after 8 but... i know i didnt lol. so... but yeah alot of my friends did really good,  im so proud of em... and its on to JV for me!! woo hoo! cant wait! its gonna be so fun! lol.  

well anyway... HAPPY APRIL FOOLS! lol. no one has fooled me today... thats weird, no one really does that anymore i guess... well anyway...nuthin to do tonight... call me. prob goin to the fair or sumthin tomorrow night. cant wait! lol. i LOVE <3 <3 <3 the fair!!! ANYWAY.... gotsta go! call me! xoxo

<3 <3 Chelsea

ok i just had to update cuz i was gettin tired of seein those ugly colored quiz things in my profile...lol.

well... some of my friends (jenna and alyse specifically) dragged me to cheerleading practice tryouts on monday where we learned the cheer for tryouts...i was really sore the next day and i didnt really wanna go to cheerleading again but... they talked me into it and so i went yesterday and learned the dance and got even more sore. lol. then today, jenna came over after school for a while to practice cuz we have mock tryouts tomorrow. so im really really really sore now. and jenna is about to come back over so we can practice some more....haha. wow. im gonna die! lol. o well... and i know, yall are probably thinking...chelsea? cheerleading? haha....yeah me too... i know im not gonna make the squad but hey its fun doin it with my friends and a good work out...obviously. haha. well wish me luck cuz i suuuuure need it! lol.

gotta go finish my homework before jenna gets here =)

<3 always, Chelsea

....Boring, laze around day... call me if u wanna do something tonight...

This break has been pretty fun...not much has been goin on, just hangin with friends n stuff... been watchin alot of movies come to think of it...i watched bridget jones diary today with mom lol. it was pretty good.... watched saw the other day with josh n jared...ahh! that was scary! i cant stop thinkin of the ugly scary clown! lol. o and we watched incredibles the other day too... it was better than i thought it was gonna be... wow, i have such a boring life. i cant believe im typing about all this. but nuthin else has really goin on... no guys, nothin new...pretty boring...

i went to the new mall friday and saturday..which was AWESOME! got a bunch of stuff...like a hat and shirt from hollister, some make up, and got josh his birthday present. i wanna go back to hollister it was so awesome. cant wait to go with mom and her plastic! lol.

mom and dad both got new cars...mom got a white acura MDX and dad got a red cadillac CTS... we now have red, white, and blue cars. haha.

i was informed the other day that i am a good kisser...haha. thought that was pretty interesting. guess some people are just to chicken to find out if im a good kisser or not...

im so proud of myself though... its been a while since ive kissed anyone... last year around this time.... um... yeah...lol.

if yall have anyone that u think would be interested in me that i would be interested in, im up for startin to talk! call me! xoxo

well i g2g get a shower n all... <3 yall! xoxo.

Frustrated b/c i cant tell if its real...
Mad b/c i dont know how you feel...
Upset b/c we cant make it right...
Sad b/c i need you day and night...
Angry b/c you wont take my hand...
Agrivated b/c you dont understand...
Dissapointed b/c we cant be together...
But still, I'll ((heart)) you always and forever

Me and josh were sorta arguing and messin around n stuff last night on the phone and i thought this part was so funny...
Josh: "ahh... u kno what sometimes u agrivate me so much...its like we're already dating"
Me: "you aggrevate me 2...we fight all the time"
Josh: "its not really fighting, its more like arguing"
Me: "ok..., well we argue alot. lol."
Josh: "thats what we do...you tell me when im bein a son of a b***h and i tel you when you're bein a pain in the a**..."
...I thought that was hilarious cuz he got it from the notebook but that movie reminds me so much of him and me like the way we argue but its not like we're mad at each other or whatever...like exactly like the movie...
well i thought it was funny anyway. lol.

<3 Chelsea
P.S. Joshua i hope your heart doesnt still hurt...lol.

What's the point of trying to meet you in the middle
You got your point of view
There's nothing I can do
Can't change your mind
Can't leave it all behind
We talk and talk
This goes on for hours
Don't wanna waste my time
With the way you act
It just can't last
  I'm moving on

There are certain things in my life that im about ready to move on from... things never change, people never change... the things that i want never seem to happen... idk whats goin on im my life or what will, but if i dont know soon, im just gonna give up and move on...

Hey yall...

Ive just been sittin at home lately...i was supposed to hang out with a certain someone last night and today (you know who you are) but "plans changed"... i guess this whole entry is sorta to that certain someone...i hope i didnt do anything wrong lately, sorry i got mad at you the other night when you came over...maybe thats why you  havent wanted to hang out or call me or anything...idk but i wish i did b/c i feel like i did something wrong...to be honest i think things were kinda awkward or sumthin the other night...we need to set things straight again...call me. xoxo, muah...

 <3 Chelsea...

Top Ten Things Girls <3 About Guys
     1.  When they arent afraid to admit things
     2.  When they get nervous around  you 
     3.  When they decide to spend time with you
          instead of a guy friend
     4.  When they call you right back when you
          hang up cuz of something they said
     5.  When they dont want to be like
          "any other guy"
     6.  The way they remember certain little
          details about something you told them
     7.  When they dont deny that theyve got
          it bad for you   

     8.  How they call every night (even when
          they know you arent gonna be awake)
     9.  How they call again and again until you
          answer
    10. When they leave sweet messages just
          cuz they know itll make you smile later
          when you hear it

   ....i miss some of these....:( they used to happen all the time but not anymore... (cough cough)...

Hey yall!
just got back from the store with my mom. I spent the night at paiges last night and the night before...but i had to come home cuz we got stupid school tomorrow....ugh. anyways. New Years sucked...i hung out with Paige n Shanon. but we had to babysit so we couldnt go to any parties. that was the part that SuCkEd. we were all stuck at paiges BORED to death!...ugh! gotta go eat dinner..ill update more later! xoxo, muah!


Payce!
 <3 always...Chelsea

Hey yall...not much to update....

Christmas break has gotten alot better. :D anyways...

got a bunch of cds today...  * Rascal Flatts (Melt),   * Ciara (Goodies),    *Toby Keith (Greatest Hits 2),   *Rascal Flatts (Prayin for Daylight),   * Garth Brooks (Live),   * Jesse McCartney (Beautiful Soul)....hours of music lol.

well tomorrow is new years eve and all i can think about is how its gonna be another year where i dont have anyone to KiSS at midnight. this sux. i have such bad luck. ugh.

     bored. tired. goin to bed. luv yall! xoxo, muah!

<3 *:c:*:h:*:e:*:l:*:s:*:e:*:a:*

Howdy guys!

I know i know, long time, no update. lol. but i am now! ok well....of course Merry Christmas! i got lots a presents like....2 dooney and bourke purses, clothes, manicure (with tips) and a pedicure, a stereo system, lots a perfume and goodies, jewelry (ring, earrings, etc.) um....o ya lotttts a money from family etc., and some gift certificates. no car...but hopefully soon! lol. well heres an update on the rest of my borrrring life.....hmm....christmas break SUX. no one can hang out cuz they're all doin family stuff and i cant do family stuff cuz we dont have family in town, my mom is sick (pray for her please), and me and my dad just, idk, dont do that kinda bonding stuff. lol. so....anyways. as for guys....sooooo confusing. one says he likes me and wants to be with me, while one is like i dont think we're ever gonna get to make this work....i wish i could just give up on them all. all they do is end up breakin ur heart in the end n e way. whats the point?.....(my new fav. quote...>>) "Dear heart, i met a boy today. Prepare to shatter." that says it all dont ya think?....idk what else is goin on in my life. everythings just so confusing and messed up right now. i have so many emotions goin through my head and idk how to put em in any kinda order. w/e  like they say...People die, things go wrong, sh*t happens, but life goes on...   : ) <3 <3

well im gonna go eat dinner. call me later if yall wanna hang out! luv yall lots! xoxo, muah!

<3 <3 *:c:*:h:*:e:*:l:*:s:*:e:*:a:*

hey yall!

today i came home early again *i did yesterday too* cuz ive been sick. but im all better now! and today i had a hair appt. and i got a sorta different hair cut...which i gotta say RoCkS! i look so sexy! haha. yeah right. n e ways...back to school for me tomorrow. ugh. school is soooo boring. specially since my joshua doesnt go there : ) well....dont know what else to say...ohh! girls (or guys...i guess. lol) what should i get this one guy for christmas...u know ThAt OnE GuY. lol. lemmie know! but n e ways. i g2g. ttyall later! xoxo muah!

i better get to see u this weekend joshua! i heart u! muah!

Howdy Beautiful... im sooooooooo happy that im talkin 2 u right now and that i have been talkin 2 u for about 4 or 5 months now i think.... its funny how we both like each other and we havent seen each other in sooooooo long.... which suckkkkkzzzz so bad.... it feels like a long distance relationship but u live like 5 mins away... =).... but its oklay..... i love 2 talk 2 u everynight.... just 2 hear ur voice makes me get butterflys exspecially when u say lil sweet thangs like when u said u miss me and u heart joshua and all that it just AHHHHHHHHHH... makes me happy.... i feel like im special u kno.... i think about u alot chelsea and i wanted u 2 kno that no matter what happens in life i will always be there 4 u.... TRUST ME.... when i think that ur mad at me i feel sooooooooo badddddddd.... like tha other night i thought  were mad at me so it took me like 45 min 2 go 2 sleep and i dont want that 2 happen again cause it sucked.... right when i woke up and thought about that and i was like dangggit... but i promise i will try not 2 ever make u mad and try 2 make u one of the happyiest people on earth.... HAPPY THANKS GIVING.....

 
<marquee>=) Love Joshy Poo Bear =)</marquee>

hey yall!
today my mom woke me up at like 9 and i got up and got a shower n stuff and then i went downstairs and helped her cook. we cooked for like 4 1/2 hours! then me and my mom and my dad all sat down and ate this gigantic meal that was waaay too much for 3 ppl. lol. there was sooo much left over...we freezed some of it and kept some in the fridge for leftovers later lol. then i took a nap and now im bored...im thinkin bout just doin my homework now cuz i know ill be busy the rest of this weekend...hopefully doin sumthin with josh...well im gonna go find sumthin to do. xoxo : )

Hey yall!....
 
Last night i was talkin to Joshua online and he was goin on and on bout how much he missed me this weekend b/c we didnt get to talk or anything...and i felt bad cuz it was mostly my fault cuz i was so busy...well we talked for like 10 min and he signed off and i was like "r u kidding me?" lol. and then he signed back on, and off, and back on...he said he was sorry for that but then he said he had to go cuz he was goin to hang w/his bro...and he left and didnt even act like he cared, after complainin about me not callin him and how much he missed me that weekend he left- just like that...and i was sooo sad :(
but---
this morning...i woke up and he had sent me 2 text messages sayin how sorry he was and how he was bein so mean and how he didnt want me to be mad at him cuz he was rly rly sorry... and it made my day. and i was soo happy and now everythings good again. :) lol. and the thing is, i didnt even have a chance to be like...i cant believe you did that, and be mad at him...and he appologized! lol. *I heart you Joshua <3*

*:c:*:h:*:e:*:l:*:s:*:e:*:a:*

I sometimes feel my heart will burst
from wanting you so much
I can't explain in words of how 
I long to feel your touch

There is no way I can convey
this emptiness inside
That seems to tear my soul to shreds
as time goes swiftly by

If I could merely hold you near 
for just a little while
If I could simply talk with you
or only see you smile

To have you look into my eyes
and wait to hear you say
Something that would help me
to take this pain away

If I have to wait forever
I guess that's what I'll do
For me, it will be worth it
to finally be with you

Mostly.. wait for the one who will put u at the center of his world bc obviously hes at the center of urs..!!
